body_html:
@satok16 Thanks.
But may I know whether fuse_remote_graph in transform_graph is necessary?
As my understanding, we can use graph transform to make the following transformations.
FP32 model->quantized model->fused hexagon quantized model.
Can I feed FP32 model or quantized model directly into tensorflow with hexagon support?

Thanks for your help.

body:
@satok16 Thanks.
But may I know whether fuse_remote_graph in transform_graph is necessary?
As my understanding, we can use graph transform to make the following transformations.
FP32 model->quantized model->fused hexagon quantized model.
Can I feed FP32 model or quantized model directly into tensorflow with hexagon support?

Thanks for your help.
